name: Octo-Ninja Hachimaru (EGX Demo)
description:
OCTO-NINJA HACHIMARU IS A 3D, FAST-PACED, 3RD PERSON ACTION-ADVENTURE GAME WITH PLATFORMING ELEMENTS.

It is also my Final Year Project at my 2-year MA Games Design and Development course at The National Film And Television School. It was featured at EGX 2021. I'm planning to make this a full release in the future.

Synopsis
Hachimaru is a ninja in the Uminoko Clan who has trouble making friends. One fateful day, he forms a pact with an Octopus entity called Takuro. Shortly after, he is assigned a super important mission to save a rich tycoon's daughter…

Notes Before playing: 
-PS4 controller only
-May have to use mouse to navigate some menus. if it becomes unresponsive, pressing start/options should fix.
-Game is now fullscreen only atm.

Current Known issues:
-issues when octo-grappling on moving platform: working to fix this, but in the meantime, please jump before grappling from moving platforms.
